website_summaries.verdict: It's acceptable if you don't need the bells and whistles of other models and like the affordable price — otherwise consider its competitors we reviewed.
pros: A basic beach chair in a classic model with practical features
Its no-pinch arm rests and waterproof materials are built to last
Fabric is durable and has vibrant colors that stand out on the beach
cons: Though the 5-position reclining capability is appealing, the flattest position is not very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This year something new has been added to "beach chairs" - a weight rating. I purchase two beach chairs, and found that they carried a 190# rating - I weigh about 230#, so I bought this chair. It was rated at 250#, so I didn't expect and issue. On the third day of use at the beach, the main legs folded over and broke. The chair was junk. I have never had a product preform this poorly, in this short of a time. I would NEVER purchase a RIO product again.
customer_reviews.author: James L Margrave Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: We bought 4 of these chairs because the picture shows a curved top rail with only fabric against your back at the top of the chair. That’s what the picture shows. The design has changed; presumably for easier shipping, but now there is a hard metal bar that hits you in the back and the “lay flat” support is another folding bar. I’m sure it’s cheaper to ship this way from China, but if everyone returns it because it doesn’t match the picture - is it really cheaper? Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: These chair are FANTASTIC. By far the best beach chair I have ...
customer_reviews.text: These chair are FANTASTIC. By far the best beach chair I have ever purchased. Bought 2 of them. My husband and I recently took a trip to the beach and realized we had no chairs. We are set now for the next trip. They open up easily, have a variety of positions and have a great carrying strap. The colors are great. I want to go to the beach, NOW!
customer_reviews.author: MRG Design

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$
customer_reviews.text: Brought this because it had 5 positions. Took it to the beach, sat down and put it in the first position, the arm fell off. I fell sideways and hurt my shoulder. Don’t waste your money. It didn’t even last for five minutes and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to other reviewers. This does not look like the photos at all and is not comfortable. There is a hard bar behind your head. There are no backpack straps. The cup holder is a zipper and hardly holds a can. Not worth the money, returning.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Bosman

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other one I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a separate chair from the same makers, slightly more expensive. It had a defective headrest and I had to return it. This chair is a little lighter, but I wish it had the backpack-style carry strap; the shoulder strap is extremely uncomfortable. The key benefit of this chair is, it doesn't have the solid metal bar under the front of the seat. So that doesn't dig into your thighs, and you can stretch out comfortably. And I LOVE the adjustable back, that's why I stayed with this company instead of going to another brand. The adjustable seat back is what really takes the cake. ... though I do wish it had a headrest :P
customer_reviews.author: Alee S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camping chair that actually lays back further than normal camping chairs. I finally settled on this one, as it says it can lay completely flat. While this is true, it's not super comfortable laying on your stomach, as your legs hang off. Other than that, the chair is pretty comfortable. I take it camping and to lay out at the lake or beach. Only other negative is it's actually not very easy to adjust. It doesn't slide very easily and gets stuck, and usually takes me a few min to finally adjust it to where I want it to be. My boyfriend tried adjusting it too and found the same problem...
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One of the better beach chairs available
customer_reviews.text: Its considerably better than most other beach chairs, but noticeably less sturdy than the pricier Rio Beach Bum chair, which is our favorite beach chair we've owned. We bought these as extras for guests as we didn't want to pay as much as our Beam bum models. the fabric choices look great as well. be wary of some models that have a solid bar up in the head area, this has a bent par to lay flat that is more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AlexCT

customer_reviews.title: Fine for sitting, not so great for lying.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these because I have another Rio beach chair which is incredibly comfortable.i thought theses were the same design.... Whith these you CAN NOT lie back in theses as there is a metal bar right across your lower middle back. Additionally, there foldable leg on top when pulled out lands on the fabric, which will not likely last very long. If I open it I manually push the fabric up out the way, but every time a kid opens it it's like a pair of scissors against the upper fabric.
customer_reviews.author: alex b

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome beach chair! Purchased for my beach week this summer and am so glad I decided to spend extra to get a good chair. It’s lower to the ground, which I prefer, and has multiple positions.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin Dearmon

customer_reviews.title: Best you’ll find
customer_reviews.text: I felt the need to write a review because I looked for beach chairs for a LONG time. Reviews would be mostly good except for those few that had bad experiences so I put off buying them for a long time. There may be a bad one from time to time but that’s not the experience I had. This beach chair was sturdy, looked nice, and made sitting at the beach way more comfortable. We used it for a week and I cleaned them well when we got home. I stored them in our basement to keep them dry and they still look good as new. They’re worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan and Olivia McCarty

customer_reviews.title: June 2020 and still got one with the straight bar - green. Otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: If you have read any reviews on this chair, you'll know it's comfortable, low to the ground, and has multiple recline positions - all great things. The only downside is the metal bar where you would lean your head back...some pictures show the metal bar as bent , some are straight. I ordered the green which shows a bent bar in the pic however my chair has a straight bar. That said - it's not bad at all. Most folks sit with a towel on their chair anyway, which softens the feel of the bar. 4 stars is appropriate because it's a pretty great chair aside from head comfort! For the price - hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Walleye Dave

customer_reviews.title: Your head rests on the bar
customer_reviews.text: I am not very tall, yet my head is resting on the bar. Who wants to sit at the beach with your head resting on a hard bar all day.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer260

customer_reviews.title: Chair NOT as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs when you get the correct model--the one without the bar going straight across. This bar is directly where your head hits it when you sit down. Some of their chairs have it and some don't. But, I have now ordered two that don't have this annoying bar on it based on the photos of the color/pattern. Both showed up with that bar and I've now had to return both. It's getting very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: CandyB

customer_reviews.title: A Metal Bar where you rest your head?
customer_reviews.text: Loved the chair except for one major point. The metal support bar that run across the top of the chair makes for a very uncomfortable head rest. I guess it was necessary to support the fold down support on the top of the chair, but makes for a very uncomfortable head rest. So as long as you are short, say like 5'10" or less, or you always sit upright it's not an issue for you. But I wanted this chair so I could lay flat and it's no good for that at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor84

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Got ad a great price. It was “used but I. Good condition” only problem I’ve come across is the teeth to hold the positioning for the back of the chair seem worn? Or not deep enough. So occasionally i fall backwards. Ha. No worries tho. Wonderful chair.
customer_reviews.author: Crishultz

customer_reviews.title: Chair broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought two chairs, one was fine but the other was broken. When the chair was placed in the 2nd or 3rd setting, it would fall back suddenly into the next setting on the right side. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What we wanted but not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: The first chair broke when I reclined. It was replaced very quickly. I haven't tried the replacement chair yet but will in the next day or two. I hope it's better as this price was more than other Brock and morter stores but we got the green we wanted. If this one breaks I will return both but it is a product we want, just not robust enough. After using these chairs a couple of times, I wish I did not buy them. They are not comfortable and flimsy. If I codni would send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Karen

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I sat on it. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: My previous Rio has lasted for over a decade. Even when I was I weighed over 230 lbs. I now weigh 185. I bought this new Rio, justso I owned a chair that wasn't ratty. The new Rio chair BROKE THE VERY FIRST TIME I SAT ON IT. It looks great, but now I have to ship the expensive chair back to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D Co

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Last After One Use
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these for a beach vacation and overall it was comfy. Upon the 2nd use of the chair and it wouldn’t stay in an upright position. The mechanism that’s supposed to hold it in place via the chair handle is plastic and somehow was worn down so much that the chair wouldn’t stay in the arm hook. So needless to say we didn’t get to use it for our vacation which is the only reason we bought it. I had to find a store and purchase another chair while on vacation. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Angela L

customer_reviews.title: Chair broke within an hour of first use
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this chair. I have no idea who wrote the positive reviews, maybe they are fake or maybe it is 50-pound children using the chairs. This chair broke within an hour of the first use of it. I used it on concrete and not in sand.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Beach chair
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color! Lays back all the way. Main reason I chose this. Not heavy and comes with a strap to carry it on your shoulder. Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Rust! Frame NOT all Aluminum.
customer_reviews.text: The chair would be perfect except for one major issue: The tubular frame that holds the seat fabric is coated steel, not aluminum (the rest of the frame is aluminum). So if you plan to immerse the chair in water, beware. The water will stay in the frame tube and then leak rusty water, staining anything it drips on. I purchased two of these chairs intending to use these in the shallow submerged 'beach' deck on our in-ground pool, now we can't. After two weeks of use, we can no longer use them as planned.
customer_reviews.author: CaptNemo

customer_reviews.title: Easy chair for convenience.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet little chair for enjoying a lovely summer's day or night. Has a good carrying strap, and is relatively light. My only complaint is there is no real comfortable spot for my head to rest. The "towel rack" upper part makes for a need to add a pillow, or carry a towel to make up for a space to rest my head. I am a little over 5"3", so I'd imagine if you are tall, or shorter, this would not be an issue for you. I LOVE the chair has 5 positions....and will lay flat if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair so much I ordered a second one. Took for ever to arrived though
customer_reviews.author: Jeniffer Simmons

customer_reviews.title: It's "OK"...
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about this chair EXCEPT for the size. The seat needs to be deeper and the back needs to be longer. (It would be great if I wasn't 6' tall.) This chair is designed for a shorter person. My one complaint regarding the construction is: the "catches" that hold the back in place have evidently worn down (in just one season) & allow the back to fall backward suddenly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived the day before we were scheduled to leave for our beach trip and by the time we realized it was broken we were already at the beach. The plastic latching on the left arm was broken off so there was no support at all on that side when reclined. I had no choice but the use the chair anyway because it's all I had. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Zuber

customer_reviews.title: It's not great but not awful for use.
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight so easy to carry. Not comfortable to lay on my your stomach if it's totally flat. It says safe adjust on the handles but it drops flat on the last 2 notches and it actually hurt a lot. It's done this every time I try to put it on the last 2 sitting positions before laying down position. Other than that it's not a bad chair.
customer_reviews.author: American Sellers of the USA

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured. Different design. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Has a design not pictured. The adjustment sides are plastic not metal. The bar across the top keeps you from laying your head back. I am on vacation or would return.
customer_reviews.author: K. Huenink

customer_reviews.title: Best for the under 150 lb person
customer_reviews.text: Easy folding, lightweight, comfortable with the adjusting incline. Problem is that the hollow aluminum frame could not hold 170 lb person. Within three days at the beach the frame bottom bent and tore making the chair no longer usable. Worked well for our smaller family members under 130 lbs. Chair was great until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to be of good quality; wasn't.
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks nice. The colors pop, it feels relatively sturdy. Great. First time sitting in the thing the wooden arm rest snaps away from the metal frame, splintering the wood and making the chair impossible to sit on. This could have been a manufacturing defect so take this review for what it's worth. My two cents: this chair is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Markus

customer_reviews.title: Yikes- this thing is awful
customer_reviews.text: The good reviews baffles me. This chair has a metal bar at the top that lands on the back of your head and it’s completely uncomfortable. I’m 5 ft 3 and my bf is 6ft and we were both in hell testing this thing out. A shame since it’s otherwise nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Julien Calderbank

customer_reviews.title: Not As Pictured!
customer_reviews.text: The chair I received is different than the picture. The seat back is too low and there's a bar across the top that hits the back of your head (I'm 5'5") making it very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Functional Chair; Great Value
customer_reviews.text: After looking at multiple other chairs in stores (only to find them poorly made and more expensive), we took the leap and bought three of these. We were not disappointed. They are well-made, sturdy and highly functional. The ability to lie flat is also a plus. The only nit is the strap is not as high-quality as the rest of the chair, but they worked fine walking to and from the beach. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it reclined snd comfort of the seat. It is a little low where your head rests and their is no padding on the bar. I don’t like the plastic slots that the arm rests go in to to recline. I used it one time and the left arm slipped out of the slots. They should be metal to be secure. I am returning for a replacement and hope this one is just defective.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Great Lake Chair
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a trip to the lake and it was wonderful! I had several people comment on it. I love that it allows you to lay flat, which I used to read a book and get a tan on my back. The chair is light weight and easy to carry with the strap. It’s so comfortable I’ve been using it on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Best beach chair!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I upgraded to a new chair this summer. It is perfect for the beach/lake. Low to the ground, so those who have a struggle getting up from a low position will not find this chair comfortable or easy to use. Easy to stretch your legs out and recline. The cup holder is a little wonky and I wouldn’t trust it with an open lid beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Teacherlady

customer_reviews.title: Great beach chair
customer_reviews.text: I was searching a long time t find the comfortable beach chair at a reasonable price. I recommend it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lubka

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are ok for just sitting. I bought this because it lays flat but it's so uncomfortable when laying flat that I can't even use it. Also, the quality is poor. The hooks to lower the back only work for 2 settings, the others won't lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Holt

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: They looked real good. Went to beach today for first time with chair and the tubing bent like soft cheese. This should be able to hold weight of a grown man. 6'0 225 lbs, but it did not. Very displeased . I should have given the money to the poor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, long-lasting beach chairs. Super sturdy, comfortable, and easy to carry. We had our last Rio chairs for over 10 years and finally had to replace them. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: MountaineeringGal

customer_reviews.title: so they are very easy to tote to the beach
customer_reviews.text: Why have I not owned these previously?!?! We got them straight off the delivery truck and tried them out in the front yard. It was SO hard to get back up and go about the rest of our day. They are light weight, so they are very easy to tote to the beach. We keep them in our shed and use them when we have company over or are watching our daughter play in the backyard. They have been great and I can't believe we didn't realize that we needed them before now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! Love the color. Wish the back was slightly higher but it is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Shawna R

customer_reviews.title: Great beach chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these beach chairs. I bought two in the watermelon print. Very comfortable and spacious. Super light weight so easy to schlep to and from the beach. Added bonus they lay all the way down. Honestly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cats and Cupcakes

customer_reviews.title: bent on 2nd day of use
customer_reviews.text: This chair has a weight limit of 250 pounds...my 200 lb. husband sat on this chair today and it bent. Very disappointed with the quality. I called and was able to get a refund. Maybe it's OK if you are a very small person. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nmboller

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This product did not hold up to weight restriction. The product is so cheap and not durable within in an hour the back bent and metal snapped !!! 190 lbs and this is what it did . I have owned rio chairs before (10 yrs old ) and brought this to replace !! What junk metal frame is flimsy and cheap !! Waste of money so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA MUNIZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach chair for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beach chair for a great price. We used these for a concert where the chair could not be more than 9 inches off the ground. I am 5'10" and this fit me beautifully. I could comfortably stretch out my legs. I could also get up from the chair easily. I am 52, and starting to have problems rising from certain low chairs. The wooden arm rests are sturdy and comfortable to rest one's arms on. LOVE THIS CHAIR!~
customer_reviews.author: Eisley Mac

customer_reviews.title: they are lightweight
customer_reviews.text: just got the chair. ought two. oneis fine the other came with dirt Mark's and on the handle for the shoulder the stitching g is half off.it almost as though I got someone else's returned chair.dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: thaddeus Gabara

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Ok beach chair. The cup holder is pointless. I ended up buying a small table to hold my cups. I located these chairs cheaper at Marshall’s. I wouldn’t buy them again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Have owned other RIO beach chairs and they were excellent. Returned this one after opening the box. It was smaller than prior RIO chairs, and not as sturdy. Disappointing product from what I used to consider a company that produced very good products.
customer_reviews.author: GWP125

customer_reviews.title: My book, the sun, the water and THIS CHAIR!.....
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to buy this??? Live in a lakeside community and am always at the beach, even more so now that I have a comfortable chair. Love it and reasonably priced. Also, I have bad knees and was worried that it would sit so low that I wouldn’t be able to get out. Not the case. It is a perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful sturdy chair. So glad I bought it. Nice strap with shoulder pad. The fabric is sturdy as well as the frame. Don’t hesitate choosing this chair. You will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: JCharles

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Liked these chairs, bought several, all different colors, very bright and pretty and attached cup holder comes in handy although it is a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.author: MariQ.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. The high back makes the chair a perfect length when you lay flat. The leg on the back that folds flat makes for easy storage in the trunk of my car. I am planning to buy another
customer_reviews.author: Lisa 1966

customer_reviews.title: Great but poor cup holder
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We wanted matching blue basic chairs and these are just that. The cup holder i will say is a waste. You can’t put anything in it y’all that a soda can bc it falls over and leans to the the side.
customer_reviews.author: Zach & Ryan Ford

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Price finally dropped to what I thought was reasonable at 22 dollars. Super comfy, fun bright green summer color, comfortable carrying strap and low to the ground, which though harder to get up makes it comfortable to lay on my stomach. Not sure of durability yet since I just got it but seems like it should hold up. I do wish it had a cup holder and maybe a second strap for the option of carrying it like a backpack!
customer_reviews.author: E. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for the beach hoping to have my $50 chair last a couple years. The one chair wouldn’t even fold up, opened it completely up my boyfriend 133lbs sat on it and it bent and collapsed into pieces. This chair did not even make 10 minutes on the beach so disappointed. I was not about to pack them in the car to return. The other chair did not make the week, before it collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS CHAIR. I have only had it a short time but it seems like it will last for years to come. Beautiful colors, smooth operation. So grateful to have found it. These chairs that lie back completely are hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie

customer_reviews.title: broke with first use
customer_reviews.text: *we ordered 2 chairs and one of the chairs broke with the first use *the company did not respond through email or phone call *did get a refund from amazon after a long phone call *amazon is great!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beach Chair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worked for me. The chair as well as the carrying strap are sturdy and well made. Adjustable position are great and I liked being able to lie almost flat in the chair. You get alot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Family

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan! I was really hoping to find a nice, comfortable, easy to fold pool/beach chair. I'm 5'7"...when I sit in it, the back of my head hits the metal bar on the upper back. Not comfortable. Several times (after ensuring that it was secured in place with the armrests!) I've leaved backwards and whammmm... It slammed me down to the ground backwards. The only good things about this chair are that it's easy to carry and fold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfy, easy to fold. They do lie flat but are not the most comfy for that, especially for my very tall husband. But that's any chair of this design.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this chair! It's lightweight, well made great quality. It adjust's to different positions and is very comfortable. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Overall I really like this chair
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this chair. I will say that it sits low to the ground which makes getting up slightly difficult. Not enough to be deal breaker unless you already have trouble getting up. The chair is comfortable as far a beach chairs go. It has a strap with makes carrying it around easier although I would say in hindsight that the backpack variety would probably be easier to work with if you are carrying a bunch of stuff. Easy to adjust positions.
customer_reviews.author: Tifanne Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Useless chair
customer_reviews.text: Went to sit down on it just to notice that the chair cant even support the weight of my 90Lbs girlfriend. you can buy a better chair for 10 dollars at Wallgreens. absolute waste of money. The Right arm alwasy pops out and gives in when sat on. One of the worst built chairs ive ever seen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money, I have bought 3 and had to return them all, the day we got them out of the box and took them to the beach, one sit down in them and they broke, so cheap and bend so bad, for the price this should last. DO NOT WASTE your time and money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs
customer_reviews.text: My chairs wore out to match my beach umbrella. These are perfect. I like them. Sturdy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis G.

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife after I broke hers, haha. Our last Rio chair lasted about 5 years and the seat ripped out when I sat it in. I weigh 195 so I may just be too fat for it. She loves how bright and comfortable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Drew T.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The cup holder is a joke, it barely hangs on to the side of the chair and an angle so your liquid spills out.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the pool. The cup holder could be a little easier to use and the chair itself is a little creaky (I’m not a big person) but overall gets the job done. Really like how I can lay almost flat to tan or sit up straight. Very easy to carry around too with the strap.
customer_reviews.author: R. DePaul

customer_reviews.title: The only thing it's missing is a pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for all types of occasions and locations, and for people of all heights; especially the vertically challenged. It has several recline positions and can lay flat as well. It has a carrying strap for ease of transport. Highly recommend and will likely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Deterding

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. I can sit for hours in these chairs without getting uncomfortable. I love the wooden arms and the fact that they’re adjustable. Mine have not collapsed on me yet. Well made, sturdy chairs - and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: R Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These beach chairs are sturdy, easy to carry, and comfortable. 5 position - perfect for laying flat on your stomach. Love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Solid beach chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I give this chair 5 stars not because it is the highest quality chair on the market. However, considering it was under $20, it has all the qualities I need in a beach chair. My wife and I both bought one (2 total) and they are light enough to carry a short distance from the car to the beach. The shoulder strap is flimsy, and slightly awkward, and will prob break eventually, but serves its purpose. The adjustable angle is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Blatt

customer_reviews.title: Multi-position chair
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to sit in all positions. Laying flat, depending on build and weight, may be uncomfortable due to the bar that crosses underneath. A thick towel in the chair would help. I personally liked the chair. It has a strap for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.

product_meta.title: Rio Beach Classic 5 Position Lay Flat Folding Beach Chair
product_meta.description:
The Rio Beach Classic Lay Flat is our most popular sand chair. Enjoy all day in the sun getting an all around tan with the fully reclining, lay flat beach chair. The lightweight beach chair features 5 different reclining positions with the SAFE-ADJUST patented technology. Easily recline the beach chair without getting your fingers or hands pinched.

The RIO Beach classic lay flat portable beach chair is lightweight and weighs only 7 lbs. Easily get to where you are going with the padded, adjustable shoulder strap and compact fold.

The contoured wooden armrests provide maximum elbow and forearm comfort and are sealed with marine grade coating to prevent scratching and resistance towards every day weather elements.

Includes a build-in towel bar to hang your beach towel to dry.

The beach chair features an aluminum frame with patented locking brackets to reinforce the chair strength and prevent the chair from folding or collapsing while in use. The heavy-duty beach chair can support up to 250 lbs.

 * Seat Height: 8.5“ off ground.
 * Maximum weight capacity: 250 lbs.
 * Open Dimensions: 30.8" x 24.75" x 29.5"
 * Folded Dimensions: 30.5 " x 24.75 " x 9"
 * Product Weight: 7 lbs.
feature_bullets: CUSTOMIZED SEATING: Enjoy all day tanning with the 5 Position reclining beach chair with lay flat option
SAFE RECLINING: Recline without the worries of pinching fingers or hands with the patented SAFE-ADJUST technology built into the wooden armrests
ALL-WEATHER CHAIR: The contoured wooden armrests are sealed with marine grade coating to prevent scratching and provide weather-proof protection
STAY DRY: Includes built-in towel bar to hang up wet towels or clothes
TAKE ANYWHERE: Easy to carry design with the padded adjustable straps
COMPACT AND PORTABLE: Compact folding design takes up little storage space in the car or at home
OPEN DIMENSIONS: 24. 75" x 29. 75" x 31" FOLDED DIMENSIONS: 24. 75" x 9" x 30. 75"
